roleset.name: look attentively
roleset.note: BEHOLD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'behold' based on sentences in ECTB2. No Verbnet entry. Based on Verbnet entry 30.3, Framenet entry Perception active. Created by Jena (from behold.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with directional
example.text: Unfortunately, the poor behavior was embarrasing [*0*]-4 * to behold [*T*]-4.
